articles.title: FTP takeaways: Bangladesh the busiest, fewer ODIs for India, and T20 windows aplenty - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The big takeaways from the ICC's new men's Future Tour Programme from 2023 to 2027
articles.content: India are playing only 42 ODIs in the new FTP - the second-fewest among the 12 Full Members  •  Cricket Australia via Getty Images

articles.content:
